title: [ Minecraft.net | MERCH ] 年度庆典商品上线啦
txt_content:
1.jpg (50.05 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-19 08:46 上传






MINECON MERCH AVAILABLE NOW年度庆典商品现在上线啦

Get your exclusive MINECON swag from J!NX and Target!
从J!NX和Target商店获得你的独家定制的年度庆典商品吧！（J!NX是一个服饰品牌,产品主要包括T恤、配饰、帽子等）




How are your MINECON party preparations going? Marsh still hasn't finished making all my decorations for me, even though I've been bellowing at him loudly for weeks. Get to it, slacker!周年庆典的派对你准备的怎么样了？Marsh（也是个经常写文章的人员）还是没有帮我做好所有的派对装饰品，尽管我已经催了他好几个星期了。赶快弄吧，懒鬼！
Luckily, you don't need to rely on Marsh. Because you can now order exclusive MINECON Earth merch from J!NX and Target sites – including limited edition tees, caps and the blue wonder that is the turquoise sheep! - and get it all delivered in time for the big day. Just make sure you order your merch from J!NX before this FRIDAY THE 13TH (aargh!) if you want it guaranteed to arrive before MINECON.有一点是很幸运的，你不需要依靠Marsh。因为你现在可以在J!NX和Target的网站直接订购Minecon Earth的独家定制商品了——其中包括很多限量版的T恤，帽子和蓝色奇迹——那只青绿色的小羊！而且只要你在本周五也就是13号(嗷！)之前从J！NX商店订购你的商品，他们就会在大喜之日到来之前就把货物送到家。如果你想保证在Minecon Earth到来之前送到的话，请及时购买。
Click through the gallery to see some of the awesome swag up for grabs:点击下面的一些图片，看看这些令人惊叹的独家定制商品吧：




2.png (126.01 KB, 下载次数: 0)

2020-3-19 09:09 上传

2020-3-19 09:09 上传










4.png (196.82 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-19 09:09 上传






You don't just have to order online though. You can leave the house and visit a Target store (you can do it! We believe in you!) and buy all your awesome MINECON merch in person! So you’ll get fresh air, exercise, and - most importantly - exclusive merch! What's not to like?不过你也不是一定要在网上才能购买，你也可以亲自去Target的实体商店购买（你可以做到！我们相信你！）MINECON的独家商品！那样你还能呼吸新鲜空气，顺便锻炼身体，然而最重要的是——你可以亲自体验独家商品专卖店，何乐而不为呢？

For more information about MINECON Earth, and how you can get your hands on this MINECON merch, head over to our special MINECON page. 请访问我们的MINECON网页来获取更多关于MINECON Earth的信息吧，上面还会告诉你如何购买这些 MINECON的商品。

原文作者：Tom Stone发布时间：2017/10/9原文地址：https://www.minecraft.net/zh-hans/article/minecon-merch-available-now翻译作者：Srar
